#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
int main() 
{
	int t, n, i, j, l, c;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		c=0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		char vote[n], name[n][21];
		int count[n];
		for(i=0; i<n; i++)
		{
			count[i]=0;
			scanf("%s %c", name[i], &vote[i]);
			for(j=(i-1); j>=0; j--)
			{
				if(strcmp(name[i], name[j])==0)
					count[j]=0;
			}
			if(vote[i]=='+')
			 count[i]=1;
			else count[i]=-1;
		}
		for(i=0; i<n; i++)
		 c=count[i]+c;
		printf("%d\n", c);
	}
	return 0;
}
